description: Complete system overview detailing the AI image generation pipeline architecture, core components, and their interactions
Detailed documentation of the multi-stage image generation process, including text-to-image, image-to-image, upscaling, and outpainting workflows
Comprehensive documentation of the LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation) implementation, including parsing, validation, and application logic
Technical details of the prompt processing system, including syntax parsing, weighting, batching, and parameter injection mechanisms
Detailed documentation of image manipulation algorithms, including outpainting logic, size management, and upscaling implementations
